column4: By default, it seems apt-mirror only handes one arch. How do I make it download amd64 and i386?
I dunno if you can...  but then, just about every computer I've seen is conveniently also just one architecture, so I think i'm missing the problem?
I'm running a apt mirror for a lab.
moreover, we often have i386 chroots on amd64 workstations.
gotcha.  I don't know how to get around that, but thanks for the details
